text: Tajul Islam Md. Faruk (died 31 January 2019) was a Bangladesh Awami League politician and a Jatiya Sangsad member representing the Rajshahi-4 constituency during 1991-1995. ==Career== Faruk was elected to parliament from Rajshahi-4 as a Bangladesh Awami League candidate in 1991. He was the general secretary of Rajshahi District unit of Bangladesh Awami League. ==References== Category:2019 deaths Category:Awami League politicians Category:5th Jatiya Sangsad members Category:Year of birth missing Category:Place of birth missing
title: Tajul Islam Md. Faruk
